text: Ne balia bafwitsanga mwinywe nibalekha Abakhasi, balamile abatonyele abakhasi abo okhunyola obukhonyi omwika omulamba nibalarusibwa mutsinzu tsiabu tawe, Ne Abakhasi beene nibarula, awo mubula obubii tawe khu kabekholele abeene okhulondokhana nende amalako. Ne Nyasaye niwa Amani Owamachesi muno
